text: Grace in women has more effect than beauty.
author: William Hazlitt

text: Old hands soil, it seems, whatever they caress, but they too have their beauty when they are joined in prayer. Young hands were made for caresses and the sheathing of love. It is a pity to make them join too soon.
author: Andre Gide

text: There is nothing that makes its way more directly into the soul than beauty.
author: Joseph Addison

text: Competence, like truth, beauty, and contact lenses, is in the eye of the beholder.
author: Laurence J. Peter

text: People say I'm extravagant because I want to be surrounded by beauty. But tell me, who wants to be surrounded by garbage?
author: Imelda Marcos
